desc: Developing scalable enterprise solutions for local companies using React, Next.js, Nest.js, TypeScript, and Gin-Gonic. Responsible for full-cycle development — from API design and database modeling to frontend integration — ensuring performance, scalability, and reliability.

As a Software Developer at Radical AI, I am leveragingtechnologies such such as OpenAI, Node.js and React to develop ReX, an AI Coach who serves as a steadfast career companion for learners, offering personalized coaching, mentorship, and support throughout the various phases of their career lifecycle

Developed a real estate booking plat form using the **MERNstack**,featuring a responsive front end in **React.js** and a secure backend with **Node.js**, **Express**, and **MongoDB**, also  Collaborated with two back-end developers to integrate booking functionality and advanced property filtering, enhancinguser experience.
